# React Component Library

[![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/react-component-lib)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-component-lib)
[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/react-component-lib)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-component-lib)

A modern React component library with TypeScript support.

## Installation

```bash
npm install react-component-lib
# or
yarn add react-component-lib
# or
pnpm add react-component-lib
```

## Quick Start

```jsx
import { Button, Card } from 'react-component-lib';

function App() {
  return (
    <Card>
      <Button onClick={() => alert('Hello!')}>
        Click me
      </Button>
    </Card>
  );
}
```

## Documentation

Visit [our documentation site](https://react-component-lib.dev) for full API reference.
